description: GALLEON QUEST IO (GQ) is an international investment group for the funding of treasure recovery projects from wrecks around the world. These wrecks will be, in GQ’s determination, the absolute best projects to fund. Selection of projects will be based on both historical research and scientific underwater surveys that have already physically located wrecks from which our experts believe valuable recoveries can be made. We expect to recover coins, bullion, precious gems, and other antiquities, ranging from intact bottles of wine to cannons.
name: SEAcoin
